CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Custom_Hourly_Rate__c), Default_Hourly_Rate__c, Custom_Hourly_Rate__c) * IF( ISBLANK(Hours_Engaged__c), 40, Hours_Engaged__c) * ( (Number_of_Weekdays__c - BLANKVALUE(Number_of_Holidays__c, 0) - BLANKVALUE(Number_of_Leaves__c, 0) )/ 5)
CustomField.label: Engagement Cost
